component.name: styla-account-name-settings
accountNames
component.label: Account Names
component.helpText: The name of your Styla account for each language created in the system. You can override it for a specific language in the fields just below. If you don't know your account names, ask your contact at Styla.

input-field.name: extraPagesAllowedToOverride
input-field.label: List of Shopware paths the plugin can override
input-field.helpText: The plugin per default can only take over the home page and category pages' paths. If you publish pages with matching paths (blank path for the home page) in Styla Editor then the plugin will display the Styla content on these Shopware paths. If you want to achieve this for other Shopware paths (like a PDP) then you need to add it on the list below, each one in a new row. Examples: /foo-example-path/ /foo-example-path/bar-example-path/

input-field.name: pagesListSynchronizationInterval
input-field.label: Interval of the pages list synchronization (in minutes)
input-field.helpText: This setting defines how often the plugin checks Styla API for page updates. You can see these updates in the Content > Styla CMS > Styla Pages tab. The lower the value the more Shopware resources will be used. The minimum value is 1 minute. The default is 10 minutes.

input-field.name: pageCacheDuration
input-field.label: Page details cache lifetime (in seconds)
input-field.helpText: This setting defines for how long Shopware caches Styla page content. The lower the value the more Shopware resources will be used. The minimum value is 1 second. The default is 3600 seconds (one hour).
